name: MultControll
description:
In this game you assign controls to your square in gametime, you will assign 1 key to respawn and 3 for each move(left, right and jump) and the game will do the rest.

I made alone and I'm not good in arts, so I just use squares.

Sorry for blindcolor people, if this game get a good rating I will probably add assets to help distinguish every sprite and put some animations, but for now I just want to finish a good game that is fun.

I didnt put sound either and I wish I could use better my time in this 48 hours, but I got this game jam by surprise really, and got like 12 to 16 hours in this project.

Hope you guys liked
